APPLESAUCE: A food prepared by pureeing cooked apples.
CHALLAH: A traditional bread eaten by Ashkenazi Jews, usually braided for the Sabbath and round for Yom Tov.
KUGEL: A traditional Jewish dish consisting of baked pudding of rice, pasta, or potatoes with vegetables or raisins and spices
LATKES: A pancake fried in oil, usually made from potatoes and sometimes also onions, traditionally served on Hanukkah.
